Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class CLIMessenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.CLIMessenger
  • public class CLIMessenger
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to display messages which need to be communicated to the user. It is used only if the user has chosen a CLI based display.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static int askColor​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> availableColors)
      Output line displayed to the user used to ask them to choose a color for their character among the ones still available
      static void askConnection()
      Output line displayed to the user used to ask them to choose between Socket and RMI type of connection
      static void askGameLength()
      Output line displayed to the user used to ask them to choose how long they want the game to be, based on number of skulls.
      static void askGameMap()
      Output line displayed to the user used to ask them to choose what map they want to play the game in (4 different options).
      static void askInterface()
      Output line displayed to the user used to ask them to choose between CLI and GUI type of interface
      static void askIpAddress()
      Output line displayed to the user used to ask them the server's ip address
      private static java.lang.String blanks​(int num)  
      private static java.lang.String coloredString​(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String color)
      Returns the text written with the selected color
      private static int costLength​(java.lang.String cost)  
      private static void display​(java.lang.String string)
      Displays the string gotten as a parameter using curColor has the text color
      static void displayActions​(java.util.List<RemoteAction> options)
      Displays to the user every possible legal action their character could take, asking them to select one.
      private static void displayBold​(java.lang.String string)
      Displays the string gotten as parameter.
      private static void displayKillShotTrack​(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> killShotTrack)  
      private static void displayMap​(MatchSnapshot matchSnapshot)
      Displays to the user all the info relative to the current map state (this includes every player's position on the map, as well as what items and/or weapons are on each square).
      private static void displayPlayers​(MatchSnapshot matchSnapshot)
      Calls 2 different methods which display info relative to the players state.
      private static void displayPrivatePlayer​(MatchSnapshot matchSnapshot)
      Displays all info contained in matchSnapshot relative to the character the user is piloting (this includes loaded and unloaded weapons, as well as the other cards currently in user's possession and the current damage and mark count)
      private static void displayPublicPlayer​(PublicPlayerSnapshot publicPlayerSnapshot)
      Displays all info of a single given PublicPlayerSnapshot
      private static void displayPublicPlayers​(MatchSnapshot matchSnapshot)
      Displays all info contained in matchSnapshot relative to all the characters piloted by other players (this includes unloaded weapons, as well as the current damage and mark count and how many powerup cards does each player have)
      private static void displaySquareLine​(SquareSnapshot[] squareSnapshots)  
      static void displayTargets​(RemoteAction.Data data)
      This method is called right after the user decides on what action the want to go for.

      Displays the welcome script to the user and resets the curColor parameter.
      static void matchStart()
      Output line displayed to the user when the match has started (which occurs when the maximum number of player connects to the same room, or when the timer runs out)

      Generic method used to print any string.

      • resetColor

        private static void resetColor()
        Assigns the color "white" to the curColor parameter

      • intro

        public static void intro()
        Default intro script (displayed when the client starts)

      • login

        public static void login()
        Displays the welcome script to the user and resets the curColor parameter.

      • incorrectInput

        public static void incorrectInput()
        Output line displayed to the user when they send an incorrect input line

      • insertName

        public static void insertName()
        Output line displayed to the user used to ask them to choose a username

      • askConnection

        public static void askConnection()
        Output line displayed to the user used to ask them to choose between Socket and RMI type of connection

      • askIpAddress

        public static void askIpAddress()
        Output line displayed to the user used to ask them the server's ip address

      • askInterface

        public static void askInterface()
        Output line displayed to the user used to ask them to choose between CLI and GUI type of interface

      • askColor

        public static int askColor​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> availableColors)
        Output line displayed to the user used to ask them to choose a color for their character among the ones still available
        Parameters:
        availableColors - List of colors the user can choose from
        Returns:
        Integer that represents the number of colors the player can choose

      • askGameLength

        public static void askGameLength()
        Output line displayed to the user used to ask them to choose how long they want the game to be, based on number of skulls. This message is displayed only if the user is the first one to connect to the room.

      • askGameMap

        public static void askGameMap()
        Output line displayed to the user used to ask them to choose what map they want to play the game in (4 different options). This message is displayed only if the user is the first one to connect to the room.

      • matchStart

        public static void matchStart()
        Output line displayed to the user when the match has started (which occurs when the maximum number of player connects to the same room, or when the timer runs out)

      • threePlayers

        public static void threePlayers()
        Output line displayed to the user to communicate them that the room has reached the 3 player mark. So the countdown starts.

      • rollbackError

        public static void rollbackError()
        Output line displayed to the user to communicate that they entered an illegal game state.

      • printMessage

        public static void printMessage​(java.lang.String message)
        Generic method used to print any string.
        Parameters:
        message - String that is required to be displayed to the user.

      • updateView

        public static void updateView​(MatchSnapshot matchSnapshot)
        Calls 2 different methods which both display a part of the game state
        Parameters:
        matchSnapshot - Contains all the necessary info for a completed display of the current game state.

      • displayPlayers

        private static void displayPlayers​(MatchSnapshot matchSnapshot)
        Calls 2 different methods which display info relative to the players state.
        Parameters:
        matchSnapshot - Contains all the necessary info for a completed display of the current game state.

      • displayPrivatePlayer

        private static void displayPrivatePlayer​(MatchSnapshot matchSnapshot)
        Displays all info contained in matchSnapshot relative to the character the user is piloting (this includes loaded and unloaded weapons, as well as the other cards currently in user's possession and the current damage and mark count)
        Parameters:
        matchSnapshot - Contains all the necessary info for a completed display of the current game state.

      • displayPublicPlayers

        private static void displayPublicPlayers​(MatchSnapshot matchSnapshot)
        Displays all info contained in matchSnapshot relative to all the characters piloted by other players (this includes unloaded weapons, as well as the current damage and mark count and how many powerup cards does each player have)
        Parameters:
        matchSnapshot - Contains all the necessary info for a completed display of the current game state.

      • displayPublicPlayer

        private static void displayPublicPlayer​(PublicPlayerSnapshot publicPlayerSnapshot)
        Displays all info of a single given PublicPlayerSnapshot
        Parameters:
        publicPlayerSnapshot - Contains all the necessary info for a completed display of the public Player

      • displayActions

        public static void displayActions​(java.util.List<RemoteAction> options)
        Displays to the user every possible legal action their character could take, asking them to select one.
        Parameters:
        options - List of possible legal actions

      • displayTargets

        public static void displayTargets​(RemoteAction.Data data)
        This method is called right after the user decides on what action the want to go for. It is used in case they chose a targeting action (like firing or moving another player). It displays all the possible targets, relative to the previously selected action, the user can choose.
        Parameters:
        data - Parameter of the chosen RemoteAction, which contains all the possible targets the user can choose.

      • displayMap

        private static void displayMap​(MatchSnapshot matchSnapshot)
        Displays to the user all the info relative to the current map state (this includes every player's position on the map, as well as what items and/or weapons are on each square).
        Parameters:
        matchSnapshot - Contains all the necessary info for a completed display of the current game state.

      • displaySquareLine

        private static void displaySquareLine​(SquareSnapshot[] squareSnapshots)

                                               int line)

      • display

        private static void display​(java.lang.String string)
        Displays the string gotten as a parameter using curColor has the text color
        Parameters:
        string - Displayed String

      • displayBold

        private static void displayBold​(java.lang.String string)
        Displays the string gotten as parameter. Uses bold characters when the boolean parameter is true.
        Parameters:
        string - Displayed String

      • coloredString

        private static java.lang.String coloredString​(java.lang.String text,
                                              java.lang.String color)
        Returns the text written with the selected color
        Parameters:
        text - String which needs to be returned
        color - String which represents the color used to write the "text" String
        Returns:
        "text" String written in the selected color
